name: The Player Who Cant Level Up
author: Updating
content: When Kim Gigyu received his invitation to become a player &#40a unique-ability player, at that&#41, he thought his struggles were over. But no matter how hard he tries, he just can’t seem to get past level 1!After five years of working as a guide on the lower floors of the tower, he’s finally discovered his ability to link with “Egos” and raise his stats. As his new skills unlock adventures in unexplored gates, Gigyu gets his chance to defy expectations and show the world that rank isn’t everyth
